Padded Dog Vest Harness: Adjustable dog harness features breathable mesh fabric, strong velcro closure, buckle strap and heavy-duty metal rings for easy and safe dog leash attachment
Fits Most Breeds: This dog walking harness medium was designed to fit most medium breeds of dogs. Please refer to our sizing chart and choose a larger size if your dog is between sizes. Medium: fits 16 – 17 in chest, 11 – 12 in neck.
3 Security Measures: The velcro straps allow you to wrap the harness snug without catching his fur. The buckle secures and provides quick-release, while double rings ensure leash safety at all times
Pet Supplies for Furry Friends: We are pet owners first and business owners second, making our own products and standing behind them

Manufacturer Panasonic
Country of Origin Malaysia

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ]

Price: $180.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:56 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGF575S, with DECT 6.0 and Link2 Cell technology, answering system, dual keypad and 5 cordless phones handsets, allows you to link up to two cell or smart phones and integrate them into the telephone system via Bluetooth, no landline phone line required. All of your contacts stored into your cell or smart phone can be shared with this phone system allowing you access to important contacts right from the handset. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up with text-to-speech announcements in English and Spanish from the base unit and cordless handsets in the home/home office. The Panasonic home phone with answering machine also features easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional systems available in the market today. Do not overload power outlets and extension cords. This can result in the risk of fire or electric shock.
Expandable Panasonic Cordless Phone with Answering Machine: 5-handset home phone system with added features to keep you connected; Digital Answering Machine stores 18-min of messages
Interference-Free, Secure Phone Signal: DECT 6.0 wireless technology for whole home coverage and less interference from other electronics; ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls
Bluetooth Phone Connects to Cell and Voice Assistants: Make and receive calls from your cellular device with Link2Cell pairing up to 2 cell phones; connect handsets to Siri, Google Now and S Voice through Voice Assist feature
Bi-Lingual Talking Caller ID and Smart Call Blocker: Talking caller ID announces caller information in English or Spanish; block unwanted calls with the push of a button on telephone handset or main base unit
More Features to Enjoy: Handset to handset intercom and baby monitor function, battery back-up for up to 12-hr talk time when the power goes out, 3000-entry phone book, and more

Advanced Calling Made Easy

Improved five-handset system syncs two smartphones, connects to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice, blocks unwanted callers, includes Talking Caller ID, and a headset jack. Expandable up to six handsets.

Read more

Sync Two Smartphones

The simple push of a button links up to two smartphones to make and receive cell calls routed through your Link2Cell handsets. Advanced Class 1 Bluetooth extends calling range to 330 ft. to easily handle calling from both cell lines simultaneously.

Connect to Siri, Google Now and S Voice

When synced to your smartphone via Link2Cell, you can connect to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice anytime from your handsets with the Voice Assist feature. Simply press ‘Assist’ on the handset or base unit to send voice commands for making phone calls, checking new messages, weather and more, and hear the responses on the handset.

Block Bothersome Callers

With a dedicated Call Block button on each handset, it’s easy to block telemarketers, robocallers, and other unwanted caller numbers. One button registers up to 250 caller numbers — even while the phone is ringing or while you’re talking or listening.

Talking Caller ID

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re on the other, Panasonic’s advanced Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish and Text ID tell you who’s calling with text-to-speech announcements from speakers in the base unit and handsets.

Read more

Beyond Intercom

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic ‘s exclusive Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Power When the Power Goes Out with Low Battery Alert

Included rechargeable backup batteries keep you connected when the power goes out. With a fully charged handset in the base unit, you’ll have power for up to 12 hours talk time and 7 days standby for calls using other cordless handsets in the house.

Now, when any of your handsets are running low on power, the handsets alert you. And as an added convenience, a large, highly-visible battery status icon on the handset LCD lets you know as well.

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Large Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch high-contrast white backlit LCD and enlarged, easier to see and use dial keys and function control buttons make home and home office call management quicker and more convenient for everyone.

Read more

Additional Calling Conveniences

With the Panasonic KX-TGF575S system, you can program and store up to 3,000 numbers in your phonebook, and enjoy the time-saving convenience of nine speed dial settings and handset-to-handset intercom.

App Alert (for Android) :

Download the Panasonic Link2Cell app to stay informed and up to date via your smartphone, tablet and Link2Cell system. Receive SMS, email, calendar, low battery notice, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram notifications on your Link2Cell base unit and LCD handsets.

Accessories :

The KX-TGF575S base unit is wall-mountable and comes with matching wall bracket and screws. Two rechargeable AAA-size Ni-MH batteries plus a belt clip are also included.

What’s in the Box :

  • KX-TGF575S phone system base unit
  • 5 Cordless handsets
  • 4 Chargers
  • 5 Belt clips
  • Wall mount
  • 10 Rechargeable Ni-MH AAA-size batteries

Read more

Product Description

MUYI 20 PIECES DECORATION STRIP, personalized decor for your car vent outlet. Makes your car interior atmosphere stylish and brightly; gives you an enjoyable driving experience!

Decoration Trim Product Size Measuring 7.68″ in length, 0.16″ in widith, 0.3″ in heigth.

Perfect selection for Mother’s Day, Birthday, Christmas, Valentine day, Wedding, and New Year.

MUYI 20 PIECES AIR OUTLET TRIM Features

Soft PVC, electroplated processU-shaped design, tighten automaticallyFree cuttingWaterproof and Sun CareMultiple color options20pcs per package Attention PLEASE!

PLEASE MAKE SURE IF ITS COMPATIBLE BEFORE PURCHASED!

Effect display

The front grille is mundane and boring before install the MUYI shiny decoration trim.

Effect display

The air outlet is upscale and full of atmosphere after installation.

Effect display

The front grille is mundane and boring before install the MUYI shiny decoration trim.

Effect display

The front grille is full of personality and dazzling after installation.

ONLY SUITABLE FOR STRIP AIR OUTLETS!! PLEASE DOUBLE CONFIRM BEFORE PURCHASED!!!

Horizontal Vent

Suitable for horizontal vents.

Vertical Vent

Suitable for 90% of vertical vents with no curves.

Horizontal Round Vent

Only fit for vents with flat and straight fan blades.

NONE OF THE FOLLOWING AIR OUTLETS ARE SUITABLE!! PLEASE DOUBLE CONFIRM BEFORE PURCHASED!!!

Irregular Round Vent

Not suitable for irregular round vent with no fan blades.

Round Vent

Not suitable for round vent with curvy fan blades.

Irregular Round Vent

Not suitable for round vents with fixed inner circles.

STEP FOR INSTALLATION

Package Included
20PCS 20PCS 20PCS

Length
7.68 inches 7.68 inches 7.68 inches

Width
0.16 inches 0.16 inches 0.16 inches

Height
0.3 inches 0.3 inches 0.3 inches

Personalized Decor – Those 20-pieces shiny decoration strip makes your car interior atmosphere stylish and brightly; gives you an enjoyable driving experience.
Durable Quality – Made of high quality PVC material in Plating Effect. MUYI car vent strim accessory features with waterproof, corrosion resistant, bendable, can be used for a long time without worry of breakdown, fade and scratch.
Universal Design – U-shaped design, seamlessly fits. Measuring 7.68″ in length, 0.16″ in widith, 0.3″ in heigth. Suitable for straight air vent outlet grille type, as you can see from photo, not suitable for arc, curve or round type. PLEASE MAKE SURE IF ITS COMPATIBLE BEFORE PURCHASED!
Handy Operation – Convenient and easy to use. Step 1, you need to Wipe clean the outlet before installation. Step 2, measure and compare the size, use scissor to cut the length that match the air outlet. Step 3, open the strip and snap on the air vent outlet.
Package Include – Pack of 20 pieces car vent outlet trims. Make your car interior more sparkling and stylish. It also a perfect gifts for Mother’s Day, Birthday, Christmas, Valentine day, Wedding, and New Year.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $39.99 - $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:57 UTC – Details)

From the brand

GARTOL Gardening Tools

Not sure how to get your GARTOL product to work correctly?

Contact our friendly support team for quick solutions.

The GARTOL is a 20 years old and professional brand in the United States. Our products are famous for high quality. We are specialized in manufacturing a wide range of garden tools comprising lopper, hedge shears, grass shears, hand pruners, hand saw, cultivator, rake, flower stand, and so on. All the products are sold to many countries and areas, including Europe, the USA, Australia, and East-south Asia.

Please let us know if you are interested.

GARTOL Miter Shears

GARTOL Garden Lopper

Garden Hose Holder

Garden Tool

Pump Sprayer,Plant Caddy

Ladies Sexy Stockings

Pump sprayer, Pruning shears

GARTOL Tools

ANTIRUST SK 5 STEEL BLADE Sharp sturdy blade, ideal for cutting chamfer, round molds, trunking and pvc strips, rubber gaskets, molding and weatherstrip.
HIGH-PRECISION ENGRAVING SCALE Clear and precise scale surface to help you cut accurately. Adjustable slider on the scale surface allows for a 45°-135°cutting angle, free to cut the trunking to different shape when needed.
ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED HANDLE Strong and durable integrated handle is made of aluminum alloy and PPC anti-skid cover. Comfortable grip no hand fatigue for long-term use.
TURN CLASP SAFETY LOCK The turn clasp closure is easy to close and open, safe and convenient, you no need to worry about being accidentally scratched by the blade.
REPLACEABLE BLADE This trunking scissors set includes additional Spare Sharp heavy duty replaceable blade. Notice this shear is not suitable for cutting metal and stainless steel.

Have you ever had problems measuring your material only to realize it is slightly off and have to redo the entire thing?

If you’ve ever installed small moldings, such as quarter round, you’ll immediately recognize the utility of these miter shears.

GARTOL miter shears are perfect for all your installation needs to save you TIME. Use for cutting time trim, PVC piping, quarter round, tack strip, and other light materials.

Toggle to adjust the angle you want

The basic shear has a jaw with right and left 45° fences, and incised markings for 60°, 75°, 90°, 105°, 120°and 135°. Free to cut the trunking to a different shape when needed.

Don’t waste time measuring and cutting when you can do both at the same time with our Miter Cutters.

Read more

Multi-function angle shears great for cutting chamfer, shoe molding, trunking and wood parts for carpet.

Handy for odd trimming jobs, rubber plastic edge strip, PVC trunking corner, PVC edge strip, semi-circular strip, thin wooden splicing, and so on.

Snipping dowel and rods and all those other tasks too hard for scissors, yet too small for a saw. These multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.

Works effectively with softwoods up to 3/4″ in size.

Read more

The set includes additional spare sharp, heavy-duty replaceable blade

Our miter cutter has 2 Sk-5 steel blades, non-slip ergonomically designed handle, high-precision engraving scale, clasp safety lock.

  1. Premium stainless steel blade comes ready to take on any job, including cutting PVC, piping, wood trim, wires, or other similar materials without pulling out big materials.
  2. Whether you’re a handy person looking for a new tool or a professional with specific needs, these multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.
  3. Our tools come with a full steel frame and ergonomic rubber soles that provide great traction and comfort to help the hand when applying pressure on the cutter.
  4. Our pre-attached angled reference saves you a load of time and the hassle of measuring the angle trying to cut. Helps with accuracy and efficiency for your angle measuring needs

Read more

NOT SATISFIED?

If you are not completely happy please get in touch with us before leaving negative feedback. We can’t help you if you don’t let us know for assistance.

Please let us know via your Amazon order or our Amazon store. Enjoy GARTOL’s 1-year after-sales policy.

Thank you!

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:09 UTC – Details)


3M Exterior Attachment Tape is a high performance automotive tape ideal for attaching exterior automotive body side moldings, wheel lip molding, door edge molding, badges, nameplates, emblems, LED Lights and trim.
Ideal for attaching moldings, emblems and trim to exterior painted automotive surfaces
For industrial/occupational use only. Not for consumer sale or use.

3M Exterior Attachment Tape

Details

  • Permanently attaches side moldings, trim and emblems to vehicle exteriors and interiors
  • Excellent for narrow width applications
  • High strength double-sided adhesive withstands weather and impact
  • Easy-to-use press-on tape eliminates tools and mess
  • An excellent alternative to rivets
  • Add long term value to your vehicles, quickly and easily

3M Exterior Attachment Tape is ideal for permanently attaching side moldings and trim to your vehicles, adding long-term protection and value. Use the same elastic bonding technology employed for airplanes and skyscrapers to attach narrow body moldings, trim and emblems to your vehicle. This tape features an extremely strong adhesive, and it’s also easy to use – just pull of the liner and apply.

A High-Performance Tape Specifically for Auto Exteriors

Designed specifically for auto care and maintenance, 3M Exterior Attachment Tape permanently attaches plastic, metal, carbon fiber and composite parts to your vehicle’s painted or unpainted surfaces. With this narrow-width tape, you can install side body moldings, drip rail moldings or fender and wheel trim to add instant protection against door dings and other hazards. Use this high-strength double-sided tape to add value to your vehicle by quickly installing or restoring decorative interior and exterior trim or factory emblems. The tape adhesive bonds instantly and holds up to impact, moisture and solvents used in routine maintenance.

Read more

Why Use Attachment Tape?

Unlike mechanical fasteners such as screws, rivets or clips, attachment tape does not require drilling or piercing holes in sheet metal which can lead to rust and corrosion. It goes on without the mess of other adhesives that can run, drip or smear, which means less cleanup during the installation and after it’s complete. The final installation is clean, low profile and very secure – just like in a professional shop.

3M Exterior Attachment Tape is exceptionally easy to use. You don’t need any special tools – just cut the tape with a scissors to the desired length. Then simply apply tape to the trim, light, emblem, body side, wheel lip or door edge molding, position, remove the peel-off liner and press the item in place on the vehicle exterior.

Reduced Vibration for a Smoother, Quieter Ride

By securely fastening trim, emblems, lights and other exterior items, 3M Exterior Attachment Tape can also help reduce unwanted noise and vibrations as you operate your vehicle. It can serve as a sound-deadener, reducing the vibration of loose parts and the resulting noise through your vehicle’s metal and aluminum components. This make rides quieter and smoother, and improves overall satisfaction with your vehicle even when you’re not driving it.

The Science of Better Auto Care from 3M

Since a 3M lab assistant invented masking tape in the 1930s, 3M has been developing products to help you get the most enjoyment and value from your vehicles. 3M Exterior Attachment Tape is a great example: instantly add value and longevity to your vehicle with moldings, emblems and other components, without tools or mess. This attachment tape is also an excellent example of what 3M does best – Science. Applied to Life.

Read more
